mapper.select: SELECT t_user.name name, t_goods.id id, t_goods.title title, t_goods.price price, t_img_goods.path pic_path, t_img_goods.NAME pic_name FROM t_user, t_goods, t_img_goods WHERE t_goods.id_user = t_user.id AND t_goods.id = t_img_goods.id_goods AND t_goods.state = 1 AND t_img_goods.NAME LIKE 'timg%' ORDER BY time_create DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT t_goods.id id, t_goods.price price, t_goods.title title, t_goods.type field01, t_goods.`describe` field02, t_img_goods.NAME pic_name, t_img_goods.path pic_path FROM t_goods, t_img_goods WHERE t_goods.type = '电子产品' AND t_goods.id = t_img_goods.id_goods AND t_goods.state = 1 AND t_img_goods.NAME LIKE 'timg%' ORDER BY time_create DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT t_goods.id id, t_goods.price price, t_goods.title title, t_user.NAME field01, t_user.icon field02, t_img_goods.NAME pic_name, t_img_goods.path pic_path FROM t_user, t_goods, t_img_goods WHERE t_goods.id_user = t_user.id AND t_goods.id = t_img_goods.id_goods AND t_goods.state = 1 AND t_img_goods.NAME LIKE 'timg%' ORDER BY time_create DESC LIMIT 8
mapper.update: update t_goods set state=#{state} where id = #{id}
UPDATE t_record_transaction SET state = 1,trade_no=#{trade_no} WHERE id=#{id}
